title: .json+.py Architectural Pattern Store
description: A registry of instances where structured data stores (.json) are paired with user-friendly display scripts (.py) sharing the same name and path.

pattern_definition.logic: .json files serve as the rigid, versioned 'nerves' of the system.
pattern_definition.interface: .py scripts serve as the 'paper', sharing the exact same path and name as the data store.

instances.name: Audit Log
instances.purpose: Renders JSON audit results as enjoyable CLI lists.

instances.name: Heartwood Map
instances.purpose: Indexes and displays the status of all JSON artifacts.

instances.name: Glossary
instances.purpose: Displays the modifying words and legislative definitions.
